Control_Name: Limit system access to authorized users
Manual_Evidence: Access Control Policy; user access review logs; least-privilege standard
Evidence_Source: Cloud IAM roles/bindings; Cloud Asset Inventory

Manual_Evidence: Role design matrix; SoD policy; change approvals
Evidence_Source: IAM role definitions and bindings; Org Policies

Manual_Evidence: Remote Access Policy; VPN/IAP configuration; approval records
Evidence_Source: VPC Firewall; IAP settings; Cloud VPN

Manual_Evidence: SoD policy; access approval RACI; audit samples of change requests
Evidence_Source: IAM bindings; Org Policy constraints; Project-level permissions
